plot: In Ireland they say it takes just three alcoholics to keep a small bar running in a country town. But what if you've only got two?
title: Breakfast Wine
plot_es: In Ireland they say it takes just three alcoholics to keep a small bar running in a country town. But what if you've only got two?
plot_en: In Ireland they say it takes just three alcoholics to keep a small bar running in a country town. But what if you've only got two?
